title.rendered: (10) Manage multi-DBMS on same UI, WEB based Spatial-DB Manager

content.rendered:
Topic: Manage multi-DBMS on same UI, WEB based Spatial-DB Manager

Presenter :  BJ Jang

Email: jangbi882@gmail.com

Type: Panel

Tadpole is open source web-based DB tool, developed from 2011. The official name is ‘Tadpole DB Hub’.

Tadpole support traditional RDB like as Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, SQL Server, CUBRID, and also support Hadoop based DB and DW like as MongoDB, Hive, Tajo, and support Amazon RDS.

In this year, we started attaching spatial data support. In FOSS4G 2014, we will demonstrate Tadpole, that support PostGIS, SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle.

It will can display queried spatial data on OSM Map, can modify spatial data by WKT.
